WidgetClass: Widget to open in the VR window. null to close an open window (if if matches the PanelID)
PanelID: ID that the UI system will use to identify the panel. MUST BE UNIQUE!
PanelSpawnOffset: Optional offset from HMD where the window opens. Pass FTransform::Identity for default logic - window will open at controller location.
PanelSize: Panel size. Should match the size of the UMG passed in.
PanelMesh: Optional custom mesh to use for the VR window.
EditorUISize: Optional override for "VREd.EditorUISize". Leave at 0 for default.
bHideWindowHandles: Turn off handles under window? (X-To-Close, movement bar...)
bMaskOutWidgetBackground: Turn off the widget's background to create a see-through look.
bNoCloseButton: If bHideWindowHandles is false, this window doesn't have a close button. (
